goals__remit:
After corporate carrier I established my own company (2005) specialised for SME, providing: Business Development Consultancy, Training & Executive Coach and Mentoring. My specific area of expertise are: Agro/Fishery/Food; Pharmaceutical; Chemical; Bio Science; Industrial Equipment; Advance manufacturing Industries; Emerging Industries (created across different sectors); Smart specialisation & Digitalisation.   
 
Continuous education and knowledge enhancement is my imperative.  
Beside MBA degree from London Henley Business School, I am Certified Knowledge Manger, specialised for Knowledge based Economy and triple helix model (public/Industry/R&D).  
 
My core competences relate to: business strategies; market & industry positioning; go to market route; innovation & knowledge management; projects development & assessment.  
Furthermore I am assessor expert for H2020 programmes (SME instrument; Fast track to innovation, Clusters for Innovation Value Chains).
